title: Student Housing at DePaul | DePaul University | DePaul University, Chicago
content: Student Life Life at DePaul Student Organizations Housing Virtual Campus Tour Student Orientation DeBlogs Career Center Athletics Art Museum Student Affairs Bookstore Apply Online Request Info Visit Campus DePaul University>Student Life>Housing Student Housing ​​​It all starts here. It all starts now. Your college experience is about more than just classes, lab sessions, papers and exams. One of the most exciting parts is the opportunity to live on your own. Our on-campus dorms, suites and apartments are comfortable, spacious and full of students like you — giving you an instant sense of community when you walk through the door. 2,500 Lincoln Park Residents 1,800 Freshmen Residents 300 Loop (Downtown) Residents 700 Upperclassmen Residents Types of Student Housing at DePaul We offer a wide variety of student housing options for incoming students. Six halls with community and suite-style units Six halls with apartment-style units One downtown housing option with suite and apartment-style units Student Housing Links Housing rates Application process Housing options Roommate assignments Housing tours Floor plans:Lincoln ParkandLoop Off-campus housing Waitlists
